headline: Comcast Donates $50,000 to Support Storm Relief in Arkansas and Tennessee
summary: Comcast is proud to announce a donation of $50,000 to support nonprofit organizations in Arkansas and Tennessee following recent severe storms. This contribution will aid in providing essential resources to families and businesses affected by tornadoes and flooding. Comcast's commitment to these nonprofit organizations goes beyond financial support; the company worked tirelessly to repair network damage and ensure continued connectivity.
